nodes.title: Added audio on/off feature for video recording
#20 Fixed bug with preview stretch on orientation change
Fix vertical scrolls, removed some logs
fixing exception of updating layout from cameraKit thread on some dev…
Get CamcorderProfile from incoming video size
Added setAutoFocusResetDelay to api to control autofocus reset options
Fixed preview orientation & size when device is rotated
Flip snapshots, add PictureResult.getFacing and VideoResult.getFacing
Enable video and audio quality configuration parameters
Trapped camera already in use by another app error
Ability to add pass BitmapFactory.Options to decodeBitmap.
fix(issues-302): FrameProcessor not call callBack when stop capturing video
Fixed bug with deprecated method setBackgroundDrawable
Fixed issue #233. Exception on some devices when we use default videoCodec.
Added function to retrieve the current camera orientation
Bug fix issue out of memory when unable to decode byte array
Provides synchronous version of decodeBitmap and adds annotation to m…
Fix crash when try open broken camera
Callback to error in class Camera1
Bump sdk and support lib versions
Add discrete granularity to pinch and scroll events
Demo app: lock orientation to a fixed value
Check focus area max number before applying
Add: 3 second focus delay to resolve setParameters crash on Samsung.
Migrate to new Android Gradle plugin
Change the offset computation for front cameras
Add base Control class, add easy setters and CameraOptions APIs
Add option to choose the picture output size
Improve frame processing - recycle buffers and Frame instances
Reduced memory usage to avoid any OOM.
Fixes #90 Remove UncaughtExceptionHandler from CameraController in stopImmediately
Ensure Grid and focus markers are shown
Don't act on Camera if it is in the middle of a stop
Dont require AUDIO permission if audio is OFF
Use SurfaceViewPreview when hardware acceleration is off
Fix orientation when activity handles rotations with android:configChanges without locking
I believe we should dispatch other RuntimeException to caller
Add flag to disable automatic gesture handling
Add option to capture hardware accelerated overlays
#989 Engine1: Wrapped some more get/set param exceptions
Implement Swipe and Shutter callback. Add GestureAction.TAKE_PICTURE_SNAPSHOT.
add try catch to catch exceptions when takePicture fails
Fix preview on Pixel devices, fix deadlock with surface preview
Log errors when writing the image to a file
[Bug] Camera is not being closed - Memory Leak
Wrapped some crashes which connect with params
Add setter method for capture rate, can be used to record timelapse video
Restart Camera1 Frame Processing After Taking a Picture - Fixes Issue 824
Add capability to set audio codec to encode video files with.
Wrapped some crashes happened when start camera
add features: pause and resume recording video
Add setter for flag enabled/disabled auto check permissions
Add support to record video to FileDescriptor.
Drop Travis and move to GitHub actions
added support for higher frame rate
Fix for Video Start Callback delay
Fix pom file not containing dependencies
